channel.title: Vps?
channel.description:
I would like to make my server OleanPkz run effectively.
I want it to have 24/7 Up-Time, and a web client.
To do this I understand I must have a VPS (for the 24/7 uptime) and webhosting? (for the web client)
I don't know much about VPS, or web hosting so if anyone could fill me in on some information to either.
I want a VPS that's fast, and reliable. As for webhosting.. i'm not even 1% sure as to what that means.
PRICING DOES NOT MATTER ON EITHER.
Please list the best companies that offer these choices.

item.title: Vps?
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

[quote=“cardguydude, post:8, topic:433275”][quote author=JGX link=topic=535993.msg3919013#msg3919013 date=1329514702]
Hahaha

Sorry about that btw. Had a rough day.

But I used google and found over 1,000,000,000 answers but I want answers from people on here that know more about VPS or Dedicated Servers than me.
[/quote]
vps has nothing to do with a webclient. A webclient goes with your webhosting. I advise not using apache sooo many security issues.[/quote]

Well it is to my understanding that a VPS is needed for 24\7 up time. I thought a VPS also let you make a webclient?

If not, what is web hosting? and who/where is the best deals on a VPS and/or this Web Hosing?

Read full topic

item.title: Vps?
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

Yes, I know. I want my server to be one of those.
Which is the best VPS to purchase?

I want tons of players on my server with no lag.

Read full topic

item.title: Vps?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

I don’t really know, but I know they don’t belong here.

And also, you can run RSPS without VPS. It’s just that VPS is more efficient.
Webclient can be made manually without VPS.
And it depends on the “best” VPS. Best meaning… suitable for what?

Really all you can do with a VPS is keep your server on. But many good servers use strong VPSs to keep their server running.

Read full topic
